005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.datatype.markup.flexmark;
007
008import com.vladsch.flexmark.ast.AutoLink;
009import com.vladsch.flexmark.ast.BlockQuote;
010import com.vladsch.flexmark.ast.BulletList;
011import com.vladsch.flexmark.ast.Code;
012import com.vladsch.flexmark.ast.CodeBlock;
013import com.vladsch.flexmark.ast.Emphasis;
014import com.vladsch.flexmark.ast.FencedCodeBlock;
015import com.vladsch.flexmark.ast.HardLineBreak;
016import com.vladsch.flexmark.ast.Heading;
017import com.vladsch.flexmark.ast.HtmlBlock;
018import com.vladsch.flexmark.ast.HtmlCommentBlock;
019import com.vladsch.flexmark.ast.HtmlEntity;
020import com.vladsch.flexmark.ast.HtmlInline;
021import com.vladsch.flexmark.ast.Image;
022import com.vladsch.flexmark.ast.IndentedCodeBlock;
023import com.vladsch.flexmark.ast.Link;
024import com.vladsch.flexmark.ast.LinkRef;
025import com.vladsch.flexmark.ast.ListItem;
026import com.vladsch.flexmark.ast.MailLink;
027import com.vladsch.flexmark.ast.OrderedList;
028import com.vladsch.flexmark.ast.Paragraph;
029import com.vladsch.flexmark.ast.Reference;
030import com.vladsch.flexmark.ast.SoftLineBreak;
031import com.vladsch.flexmark.ast.StrongEmphasis;
032import com.vladsch.flexmark.ast.Text;
033import com.vladsch.flexmark.ast.TextBase;
034import com.vladsch.flexmark.ast.ThematicBreak;
035import com.vladsch.flexmark.ext.gfm.strikethrough.Subscript;
036import com.vladsch.flexmark.ext.superscript.Superscript;
037import com.vladsch.flexmark.ext.tables.TableBlock;
038import com.vladsch.flexmark.ext.typographic.TypographicQuotes;
039import com.vladsch.flexmark.ext.typographic.TypographicSmarts;
040import com.vladsch.flexmark.util.ast.Block;
041import com.vladsch.flexmark.util.ast.Document;
042import com.vladsch.flexmark.util.ast.Node;
043
044import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.datatype.markup.flexmark.InsertAnchorExtension.InsertAnchorNode;
045import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.ObjectUtils;
046
047import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
048import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.SuppressFBWarnings;
049
050/**
051 * Supports the production of HTML content based on a markup syntax tree.
052 * <p>
053 * This implementation is stateless.
054 *
055 * @param <T>
056 *          the type of stream to write to
057 * @param <E>
058 *          the type of exception that can be thrown when a writing error occurs
059 */
060@SuppressFBWarnings("THROWS_METHOD_THROWS_CLAUSE_THROWABLE")
061public class MarkupVisitor<T, E extends Throwable> implements IMarkupVisitor<T, E> {
062  private final boolean handleBlockElements;
063
064  /**
065   * Construct a new visitor.
066   *
067   * @param handleBlockElements
068   *          {@code true} process block content or {@code false} process the tree
069   *          as a single line of markup
070   */
071  public MarkupVisitor(boolean handleBlockElements) {
072    this.handleBlockElements = handleBlockElements;
073  }
074
075  /**
076   * Determine block processing state.
077   *
078   * @return {@code true} process block content or {@code false} process the tree
079   *         as a single line of markup
080   */
081  protected boolean isHandleBlockElements() {
082    return handleBlockElements;
083  }
084
085  @Override
086  public void visitDocument(Document document, IMarkupWriter<T, E> writer) throws E {
087    visitChildren(document, writer);
088  }
089
090  /**
091   * Process child nodes of the provided parent.
092   *
093   * @param parent
094   *          the node whose children are to be processed
095   * @param writer
096   *          the markup writer used to write the HTML
097   * @throws E
098   *           if an error occurred while writing
099   */
100  protected void visitChildren(@NonNull Node parent, @NonNull IMarkupWriter<T, E> writer) throws E {
101    for (Node node : parent.getChildren()) {
102      assert node != null;
103      visit(node, writer);
104    }
105  }
106
107  /**
108   * Process a node.
109   *
110   * @param node
111   *          the node to process
112   * @param writer
113   *          the markup writer used to write the HTML
114   * @throws E
115   *           if an error occurred while writing
116   */
117  protected void visit(@NonNull Node node, @NonNull IMarkupWriter<T, E> writer) throws E {
118    boolean handled = processInlineElements(node, writer);
119    if (!handled && node instanceof Block) {
120      if (isHandleBlockElements()) {
121        handled = processBlockElements(node, writer);
122      } else {
123        visitChildren(node, writer);
124        handled = true;
125      }
126    }
127
128    if (!handled) {
129      throw new UnsupportedOperationException(
130          String.format("Node '%s' not handled. AST: %s", node.getNodeName(), node.toAstString(true)));
131    }
132  }
133
134  /**
135   * Process a node that represents an inline element.
136   *
137   * @param node
138   *          the node to process
139   * @param writer
140   *          the markup writer used to write the HTML
141   * @return {@code true} if the node was processed or {@code false} otherwise
142   * @throws E
143   *           if an error occurred while writing
144   */
145  @SuppressWarnings({ "PMD.CyclomaticComplexity", "PMD.CognitiveComplexity", "PMD.NcssCount" })
146  protected boolean processInlineElements(
147      @NonNull Node node,
148      @NonNull IMarkupWriter<T, E> writer) throws E { // NOPMD - acceptable
149    boolean retval = true;
150    if (node instanceof Text) {
151      writer.writeText((Text) node);
152    } else if (node instanceof TextBase) {
153      writer.writeText((TextBase) node);
154    } else if (node instanceof HtmlEntity) {
155      writer.writeHtmlEntity((HtmlEntity) node);
156    } else if (node instanceof TypographicSmarts) {
157      writer.writeHtmlEntity((TypographicSmarts) node);
158    } else if (node instanceof TypographicQuotes) {
159      writer.writeTypographicQuotes((TypographicQuotes) node, this::visit);
160    } else if (node instanceof Code) {
161      writer.writeCode((Code) node, this::visit);
162    } else if (node instanceof StrongEmphasis) {
163      writer.writeElement("strong", node, this::visit);
164    } else if (node instanceof Emphasis) {
165      writer.writeElement("em", node, this::visit);
166    } else if (node instanceof ListItem) {
167      writer.writeElement("li", node, this::visit);
168    } else if (node instanceof Link) {
169      writer.writeLink((Link) node, this::visit);
170    } else if (node instanceof AutoLink) {
171      writer.writeLink((AutoLink) node);
172    } else if (node instanceof MailLink) {
173      writer.writeLink((MailLink) node);
174    } else if (node instanceof Subscript) {
175      writer.writeElement("sub", node, this::visit);
176    } else if (node instanceof Superscript) {
177      writer.writeElement("sup", node, this::visit);
178    } else if (node instanceof Image) {
179      writer.writeImage((Image) node);
180    } else if (node instanceof InsertAnchorNode) {
181      writer.writeInsertAnchor((InsertAnchorNode) node);
182    } else if (node instanceof SoftLineBreak) {
183      writer.writeText("\n");
184    } else if (node instanceof HardLineBreak) {
185      writer.writeBreak((HardLineBreak) node);
186    } else if (node instanceof HtmlInline) {
187      writer.writeInlineHtml((HtmlInline) node);
188    } else if (node instanceof LinkRef || node instanceof Reference) {
189      throw new UnsupportedOperationException(
190          String.format(
191              "Link references are not supported by Metaschema."
192                  + " Perhaps you have an unescaped bracket in the following string? %s",
193              ObjectUtils.notNull(node.getParent()).getChars()));
194    } else {
195      retval = false;
196    }
197    return retval;
198  }
199
200  /**
201   * Process a node that represents a block element.
202   *
203   * @param node
204   *          the node to process
205   * @param writer
206   *          the markup writer used to write the HTML
207   * @return {@code true} if the node was processed or {@code false} otherwise
208   * @throws E
209   *           if an error occurred while writing
210   */
211  @SuppressWarnings("PMD.CyclomaticComplexity")
212  protected boolean processBlockElements(
213      @NonNull Node node,
214      @NonNull IMarkupWriter<T, E> writer) throws E {
215    boolean retval = true;
216    if (node instanceof Paragraph) {
217      writer.writeParagraph((Paragraph) node, this::visit);
218    } else if (node instanceof Heading) {
219      writer.writeHeading((Heading) node, this::visit);
220    } else if (node instanceof OrderedList) {
221      writer.writeList("ol", (OrderedList) node, this::visit);
222    } else if (node instanceof BulletList) {
223      writer.writeList("ul", (BulletList) node, this::visit);
224    } else if (node instanceof TableBlock) {
225      writer.writeTable((TableBlock) node, this::visit);
226    } else if (node instanceof HtmlBlock) {
227      writer.writeBlockHtml((HtmlBlock) node);
228    } else if (node instanceof HtmlCommentBlock) {
229      writer.writeComment((HtmlCommentBlock) node);
230    } else if (node instanceof IndentedCodeBlock) {
231      writer.writeCodeBlock((IndentedCodeBlock) node, this::visit);
232    } else if (node instanceof FencedCodeBlock) {
233      writer.writeCodeBlock((FencedCodeBlock) node, this::visit);
234    } else if (node instanceof CodeBlock) {
235      writer.writeCodeBlock((CodeBlock) node, this::visit);
236    } else if (node instanceof BlockQuote) {
237      writer.writeBlockQuote((BlockQuote) node, this::visit);
238    } else if (node instanceof ThematicBreak) {
239      writer.writeBreak((ThematicBreak) node);
240    } else {
241      retval = false;
242    }
243
244    // if (retval && node.getNextAny(Block.class) != null) {
245    // writer.writeText("\n");
246    // }
247    return retval;
248  }
249}
